com.jme3.renderer.opengl

Interface GL

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GL2, GL3, GL4
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidGL, GLDebugDesktop, GLDebugES, IosGL, JoglGL, LwjglGL

    public interface GL
    Baseline GL methods that must be available on all platforms. This is the subset of vanilla desktop OpenGL 2 and OpenGL ES 2.
